text: z Development must provide public access along the waterfront at the River Thames. Improved green grid connections should be delivered along Blackwall Way and the River Thames waterfront, with good quality onward connections to adjoining green grid routes, such as the route over Aspen Way towards Naval Row. z Development on this site will be accompanied by delivery of a new riverbus station, to improve access to the area.
